verbs.description: [ARG1: ABC] [V: broke] [ARGM-DIR: away from The Bachelorette] [ARGM-PRP: to show President Trump extending a handshake to President Kim Jong - Un of North Korea at a special summit organized by the two men in Singapore] .

[ARG0: ABC] broke away from The Bachelorette to [V: show] [ARG1: President Trump extending a handshake to President Kim Jong - Un of North Korea at a special summit organized by the two men in Singapore] .

ABC broke away from The Bachelorette to show [ARG0: President Trump] [V: extending] [ARG1: a handshake] [ARG2: to President Kim Jong - Un of North Korea] [ARGM-LOC: at a special summit organized by the two men in Singapore] .

ABC broke away from The Bachelorette to show President Trump extending a handshake to President Kim Jong - Un of North Korea at [ARG1: a special summit] [V: organized] [ARG0: by the two men] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
